name: Hotwire
description:
Game made for GGJ2020.

A super-slow fighting game, where you must rewire two robots as they fight each other. Only playable in local PvP.

Connect the power source to the right output to produce one of three moves:

  • Block: The fastest move, that will block punches.
  • Punch: A slower move that will hit the enemy, and cause damage.
  • Block breaker: The slowest move, but it breaks through a block. Can be interrupted by a quick punch.

Created by:

  • Saga Kelly Blomberg - Art
  • Máté Tóth Ridovics - Art
  • Scott Donaldson - Design
  • András Baliga - Design, Programming
  • Preslav Petrov - Design, Programming
